name: CleanBook
bt_task: The robot task is to clean a dusty book. The behavior logic of a robot should be as follows. The book is located inside a shelf in the living room and is covered with dust. A rag is placed on top of the shelf. The robot, which is standing in the living room, needs to use the rag to remove the dust from the book. The goal is to ensure ensure that there is no dust on the books.

Move_to_Rag.description: The robot moves to the location of the rag.

Grasp_rag.description: The robot extends its one gripper and grasps the rag from the shelf.

Move_to_book.description: The robot moves to the location of the book.

Pick_up_book.description: The robot picks up the book with one gripper.

condition_node.Rag_in_gripper?: Check if the rag is in the robot's gripper.
condition_node.Book_in_gripper?: Check if the book is in the robot's gripper.
condition_node.Is_near_Rag?: Check if the robot is near the rag. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Is_near_book?: Check if the robot is near the book. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.book_is_clean?: Check if the book is clean without the dust on it.
